text: bhumiyil nasamuntakkunnatil ninn (janannale) tatayunna, (nanmayute) paramparyamulla oru vibhagam ninnalkkumumpulla talamurakalil ninn entukeant untayilla? avaril ninn nam raksappetutti etutta kuttattil petta curukkam cilarealike. ennal akramakarikal tannalkk nalkappetta sukhadambarannalute pinnale peakukayan ceytatâ€Œ. avar kurravalikalayirikkunnu
